## Message.requestElevationToAuthor() method

Throw an error if current user is not the message author

**Signature:**

```typescript
requestElevationToAuthor(strict?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  strict | boolean | _(Optional)_ Allow bypassing the check if required data is not pulled |

**Returns:**

void
